name: Bit-Deep - CorrupTones
description:
Your simple world minded its own business until suddeny - corruption! 

Evil music spreads across the world and you are the only one who can stop it. Jump across platfroms to find radios with audio tracks corresponding to the corrupted music and place them at the corruption centres. Move fast, listen and save the world!

Team Bit-Deep:

Niklas Evertsson 

Matt Stark 

Michał Pukała

Developed using Unity 2019 and Fmod Studio 1.10.10
